title: Saving replays for future viewing
body:
HI,

I have saved a replay that I would like to view later, however it will eventually no longer show on my match history, is there anyway I can still access the replay in lets say a month from now after another patch came out and its no longer showing on my match history?

thanks

replies.body: Open Broadcast System(OBS) check it out on Youtube
You will have to record it to video, using either the highlight tool built into spectator mode (which I've found unreliable for long clips) or something like OBS.
